data.title: Simon Templeman
data.text:
British actor

Simon Templeman (born 28 January 1954)[1] is an English actor. He is known for his video game roles as Kain in Legacy of Kain, Gabriel Roman in Uncharted: Drake's Fortune, Loghain in Dragon Age, and Admiral Han'Gerrel vas Neema & Dr. Gavin Archer in Mass Effect.

He played Larry Bird on The Neighbors.[2][3]

Personal life

[edit]

He is married to actress Rosalind Chao, with whom he has two children.[4]
